name: Cat Date
description: Cat-Date is a fun and interactive Angular-based application, inspired by Tinder, designed exclusively for connecting cats and their owners. Swipe right to find the perfect playmate for your feline friend, schedule playdates, and join a community of cat enthusiasts!

name: Choose Your Fighter
description: 'Choose Your Fighter' is a React project where users pick characters like bears, sharks, octopuses, and eagles to battle against the app's AI. It demonstrates React skills, interactive UI design, state management, and game logic implementation for an engaging gaming experience.

name: Magma Heaven
description: App made with Node.js, Express.js, mongoose, cookie-parser, jsonwebtoken, handlebars, bcypt, express-validators.
